context_bundle.summary: Splunk is a data platform for searching, monitoring, and analyzing machine-generated big data via a web-style interface

onboarding.quick_start: helm install splunk-universal-forwarder splunk/splunk-connect-for-kubernetes --namespace splunk --set splunkHost=splunk.example.com --set splunkPort=8089
common_patterns: Universal forwarder: 'splunk add forward-server splunk.example.com:9997' for log forwarding
Data inputs: 'splunk add monitor /var/log/app.log -index myapp' for log collection
Search queries: 'index=apache sourcetype=access_combined status=500' for error analysis
Dashboard creation: 'Add dashboard' with visualization panels and saved searches
Alert rules: 'Create alert' with 'Trigger condition: count > 100' and email notifications
KV store: '| outputlookup my_lookup.csv' and '| inputlookup my_lookup.csv' for data storage
known_errors: Forwarder not connecting: 'netstat -an | grep 9997' and check firewall rules and certificates
Indexing error: '| _index_earliest=-1m _index_latest=now' to troubleshoot real-time indexing
Search slow: '| dbinspect index=_internal summary=t' and optimize time ranges and queries
License violation: 'curl -k https://localhost:8089/services/licenser/pools' and check daily usage
Dashboard not loading: 'splunk clean eventdata' and restart splunkweb service
